Running time87 minutesCountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
The Feeling That the Time for Doing Something Has Passed is a 2023 American comedy film, directed, written, and edited by Joanna Arnow. It stars Scott Cohen, Babak Tafti, Arnow, Michael Cyril Creighton and Alysia Reiner. Sean Baker serves as an executive producer.
It had its world premiere at the 2023 Cannes Film Festival in the Directors' Fortnight section on May 19, 2023. It is scheduled to be released in the United States on April 26, 2024.


Cast[edit]
Scott Cohen as Allen
Babak Tafti as Chris
Joanna Arnow as Ann
Michael Cyril Creighton as Karl
Alysia Reiner as Sister
Keith Poulson as Simon
Peter Vack as Thomas
Release[edit]
The film had its world premiere at the 2023 Cannes Film Festival in the Directors' Fortnight section on May 19, 2023.[1][2] Shortly after, Magnolia Pictures acquired U.S. distribution rights to the film.[3] It also screened at the 2023 Toronto International Film Festival on September 9, 2023,[4][5] 2023 New York Film Festival on October 5, 2023,[6][7] and AFI Fest on October 27, 2023.[8][9] It is scheduled to be released in the United States on April 26, 2024.[10]

Reception[edit]
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 100% of 15 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 7.20/10.[11] Metacritic, which uses a weighted average, assigned the film a score of 75 out of 100, based on 6 critics, indicating "generally favorable" reviews.[12]
